page.title: 10OUTDOOR LEISURE CLOWNE.
page.content: CLOWNE HAS A VERY WIDE RANGE OF OUTDOOR LEISURE FACILITIES AVAILABLE FOR ITS RESIDENTS AND RESIDENTS FROM THE SURROUNDING AREA. THESE INCLUDE: 1.TWO RIDING STABLES WHERE INSTRUCTION IN HORSE RIDING MAY BE OBTAINED. 2.TWO LAKES OR PONDS WHERE FISHING MAY BE PRACTICED.THE LARGEST OF WHICH IS KNOWN AS HARLESTHORPE DAM. 3.TENNIS FACILITIES INCLUDE A PRIVATE TENNIS CLUB WITH ONE HARD AND THREE GRASS COURTS.THE MINERS WELFARE ALSO HAS A TENNIS COURT FOR MEMBERS.ALSO THERE ARE THREE HARD COURTS FOR THE USE OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC ON A COUNCIL RUN OUTDOOR SPORTS CENTRE.TWO OF THESE LAST NAMED COURTS BEING ALSO FOR 5-A-SIDE FOOTBALL. 4.THERE ARE PRIVATE BOWLING GREENS AT TWO OF THE CLUBS. 5.A BMX TRACK IS PROVIDED.
